'''Elijah''' is one of the friends of Kai Hale.

==History==
Elijah came to the hospital with his friend, Kai, when Kai became short of breath after swimming. Elijah and [[Tyler (A Hard Pill to Swallow)|Tyler]] both said Kai was serious about not drinking or doing drugs, but when a CT showed damaged to his lungs as if he were a chronic smoker, they admitted that he vaped. Cormac showed them the picture of Kai's lungs and told them to go tell all their friends what the vaping was doing to their lungs.

==Relationships==
===Friendships===
He, [[Tyler (A Hard Pill to Swallow)|Tyler]], and Kai Hale are on the swim team together.
